titles.title: To redesignate the Federal building located at 107 Federal Building, in Terre Haute, Indiana, as the "John T. Myers Federal Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Mr. McHugh asked unanimous consent that the Committee on Transportation and Infrustructure be discharged from further consideration of the bill H.R. 1249 and that the bill be rereferred to the Committee on Government Reform and Oversight. Agreed to without objection.
Rereferred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 4/8/1997--Introduced. Designates the Federal building located at 107 Federal Building, in Terre Haute, Indiana, as the John T. Myers Federal Building.
